title: Conceptual MVT with solid of revolution part - c

content.question: Find the x-coordinate of the point on the graph of f, between points P and Q, at which the line tangent to the graph of f is parallel to line PQ.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of the point on the graph of f, between points P and Q, at which the line tangent to the graph of f is parallel to line PQ.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
